query:
MERGE INTO simplefin_accounts AS sa
    USING (
        VALUES (
            $1::uuid,
            $2,
            $3,
            $4
        )) AS source (
            connection_id,
            simplefin_id,
            name,
            currency
        )
    ON  sa.connection_id = source.connection_id AND
        sa.simplefin_id = source.simplefin_id
    WHEN MATCHED THEN
        UPDATE SET
            name = source.name
    WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
        INSERT
            (connection_id, simplefin_id, currency, name )
        VALUES (
            source.connection_id,
            source.simplefin_id,
            source.currency,
            source.name
            )
    RETURNING
        id,
        sa.connection_id,
        sa.currency,
        sa.name,
        sa.active,
        sa.custom_name
